analysis.description:
IcoContract.createTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0x8432a5a61cf1cc5ca5bc5ab919d0665427fb513c.sol#389-418) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ethFundDeposit.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/1/0x8432a5a61cf1cc5ca5bc5ab919d0665427fb513c.sol)
	- ethFundDeposit.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/1/0x8432a5a61cf1cc5ca5bc5ab919d0665427fb513c.sol)
tokens in IcoContract.createTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0x8432a5a61cf1cc5ca5bc5ab919d0665427fb513c.sol#396-397) is a local variable never initialiazed
